clarity.justification: The assistant's responses were well-structured, coherent, and easy to understand. The assistant used appropriate language and phrasing to convey its thoughts and questions.

tone_appropriateness.justification: The assistant maintained a respectful and inquisitive tone throughout the conversation. It was perfectly suited to the context and enhanced the communication.

engagement.justification: The assistant was highly engaging. It responded well to the user's input, asked follow-up questions to dig deeper into the topic, and showed a keen interest in the user's perspective.

evaluation.rubric_description: Evaluates the quality and effectiveness of the assistant's communication style
